item.description:
The Arleen Virga Blackstone Rock Climbing Meetup group is climbing the Auburn Ice Canyon this Saturday from 9 AM to 3 PM.  Let's meet up and get to know each other.  The Auburn Ice Canyon part of a long creek off of Route 20 in Auburn/Worcester, an hour away from Boston.  The site has WI 2-3 grades, and enough room to handle a dozen or so top ropes.  While lead climbing is not recommended at this time because of bad ice, we can do mock leads.  Beginners welcomed, but you will need gear (ice climbing boots, crampons, harness, helmet, locking carabiner, Reverso or other belay device, warm clothing).  If you have additional gear (axes, ropes, slings, ice screws, biners, quickdraws, etc.), please bring it along.  We will be meeting at 8 AM in a parking lot to the right side of the Namco Pool and Patio store.  If late, just follow the directions to the climb site.

Directions

The location of the climb site is here: http://maps.google.com/maps?q=42.212976,-71.813335&z=15  (See green arrow on Google Map.)  We will be meeting in the parking lot, then hike to the climb site.

Directions using Google Maps is here: http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&source=s_d&saddr=boston&daddr=Abramson+Ln&hl=en&geocode=FZ9WhgIdw7bD-ykbMT0NLWXjiTGg6GIBJL98eA%3BFVUdhAId2m-4-w&mra=dme&mrcr=0&mrsp=1&sz=19&sll=42.212519,-71.798615&sspn=0.00155,0.002411&ie=UTF8&ll=42.251901,-71.508636&spn=0.788806,1.234589&z=10

Head west on I-90 to Exit 10A/US-20/MA-146 in Worcester.  Then turn left onto US-20 (westbound), and go 0.5 miles.  On your right will be a large shopping area with Burlington Coat Factory, Price Chopper, Subway.  Turn right into the shopping area, and park off to the side of Namco Pool and Patio--Do not park in front of the store.  Maintaining access to the Auburn Ice Canyon is important.  Parking is on private property, so do not park directly in front of Namco or other businesses.  Likewise, the walk to the climb site is through private property, so be considerate.  To get there, walk west on US-20 to the Gift Chalet, which is just before the creek and on the right.  At the far left end of the parking lot is a path.  Follow the path along the river for 0.5 miles, a 15 minute walk.

Ken
item.how_to_find_us: In a parking lot near the Namco Pool and Patio
item.why: it is close to Boston and we will be meeting fellow climbers from the Arleen Virga Blackstone Rock Climbing Meetup group.
item.name: Auburn Ice Canyon
